page.title: 12Armed Forces
page.content: The barracks and head quarters of the army in the area are not in our D-Block. We do have parts of two of their main training areas in the Block. In the East of the Block, we have an area of scrub and swamp land which is used as ranges for firing live ammunition. There are two rifle ranges and a pistol range. Years ago,when this was the centre for army railways, the main track went across this land. The other area is the Hogmoor Inclosure. This is where the army carries out driver training in tracked vehicles. They also carry out driver training in all sizes and types of vehicle on the main roads. by Alun Doyle, Gary Newell,Ian Hurdle,Mark Cornwell
